org.epochx.ge.op.mutation
Class SinglePointMutation

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.ge.op.mutation.SinglePointMutation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GEMutation, Mutation, Operator
public class SinglePointMutation
extends java.lang.Object
implements GEMutation

This class performs a single point mutation on a GECandidateProgram.

Whereas a standard PointMutation will consider each codon in the selected program for mutation, and could potentially mutate any number of codons from 0 to the number of codons, SinglePointMutation will always mutate exactly one codon in a program that it is asked to mutate. If the codon does undergo mutation then a replacement codon is generated using the CodonGenerator specified in the model.

Method Detail

mutate

public GECandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram p)
Perform point mutation on the given GECandidateProgram. A codon position will be randomly chosen from the length of codons in the program, and will undergo mutation.

Specified by:
mutate in interface GEMutation
Specified by:
mutate in interface Mutation
Parameters:
program - The GECandidateProgram selected to undergo this mutation operation.
Returns:
A GECandidateProgram that was the result of a single point mutation on the provided GECandidateProgram.
